backend/main.mo: Defines data types, maps, and authorization helpers for users, roles, tasks, soil and weather data, and includes storage and access‑control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence metadata listing feature descriptions, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of various frontend files describing recent UI, data, and component updates.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind and OKLCH‑based theme variables for light/dark modes and layout styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file loading the React app and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing for all roles and admin pages using TanStack Router with query and auth providers.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Implements demo authentication context with login, logout, session persistence, and role checks.
frontend/src/auth/demoAuth.ts: Defines demo accounts, credential validation, and localStorage‑based session helpers.
frontend/src/components/AgriTechBanner.t: Renders a reusable agriculture‑technology banner image component.
frontend/src/components/GreenXWordmark.t: Displays the GreenX text wordmark with size and color variants including on‑primary styling.
frontend/src/components/insights/CropHea: Renders an AI crop health prediction score, label, and explanation with color-coded styling.
frontend/src/components/insights/SmartAl: Displays a list of smart alerts with severity-based icons and styling.
frontend/src/components/insights/YieldEs: Shows yield estimation results or triggers a calculation based on acreage and crop type.
frontend/src/components/RoleLogo.tsx: Displays a role-specific logo image based on the authenticated user's role.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Shows the top navigation bar with branding, user info, role logo, and logout action.
frontend/src/components/weather/ExpertAd: Provides weather-based advisories such as fungus risk or spray warnings based on humidity and rain.
frontend/src/components/weather/FieldMan: Displays weather-driven recommendations for spray, irrigation, and pest risk with severity colors.
frontend/src/components/weather/Forecast: Shows a 7‑day weather forecast with temperature, rain probability, and humidity for each day.
frontend/src/components/weather/WeatherP: Displays current weather conditions, status, and risk alerts with temperature, rain, humidity, and wind.
frontend/src/data/demoExports.ts: Defines export order data and provides demo export records.
frontend/src/data/demoFarmers.ts: Defines data structures for farmers and includes demo farmer profiles with soil, tasks, payments, and logs.
frontend/src/data/demoInventory.ts: Defines inventory item data and provides demo stock for inputs, drones, and office supplies.
frontend/src/data/demoYield.ts: Defines yield data and includes demo expected yields with rainfall per farmer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, manages login state, and loads or clears stored identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode overrides, and custom text-shadow utilities.
frontend/src/layouts/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin-only layout with sidebar navigation, user info, and logout handling.
frontend/src/lib/aiLikeHeuristics.ts: Implements heuristic crop health prediction, yield estimation, and weather/soil-based smart alerts.
frontend/src/lib/formatting.ts: Utility functions to format currency, numbers, percentages, and time durations.
frontend/src/lib/prescriptions.ts: Generates fertilizer prescriptions based on soil conditions and weather factors.
Produces spray, irrigation, and pest‑risk recommendations from weather data.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Displays an access-denied message with navigation back to login.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders an admin dashboard showing KPIs, export summaries, and inventory snapshots using demo data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDiagnostic: Builds a diagnostics table summarizing crop health and soil data for all demo farmers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminExportOrde: Displays detailed information for a single export order, including shipment, destination, and financial data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminExportsPag: Lists all export orders with key details and links to individual order pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFarmersPag: Shows a farmer list and detailed profile view with land, revenue, and contract info.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminFinancePag: Provides financial metrics and a table of revenue, payments, and profitability for each farmer.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandManage: Displays land blocks derived from demo farmer data, showing acreage, crop, farmer, and status in a grid view.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Provides admin controls for notifications, data management actions, and appearance settings.
Renders a table of demo user accounts with roles, contact info, and status indicators for admin management.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWeatherAna: Shows village weather status, rainfall vs yield charts, and pest‑risk heat maps using simulated data.
frontend/src/pages/expert/ExpertDashboar: Expert dashboard for selecting farmers, viewing weather, crop health predictions, alerts, and generating prescriptions.
frontend/src/pages/field-manager/FieldMa: Field manager dashboard offering weather data, forecasts, task actions, input logging, and photo uploads for selected farms.
frontend/src/pages/land-owner/LandOwnerC: Displays a crop lifecycle timeline for land owners with completion status for each growth stage.
frontend/src/pages/land-owner/LandOwnerD: Renders the land owner dashboard with farmer selection, weather, crop health insights, yield estimation, and smart alerts. Handles navigation, state for selected farmer, and yield calculation.
frontend/src/pages/land-owner/LandOwnerR: Displays summary report cards for crop performance, revenue, and water usage along with a monthly summary. Includes navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/land-owner/LandOwnerS: Provides a form for land owners to submit support requests and shows a confirmation message after submission. Redirects back to the dashboard after a delay.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides username/password login with demo accounts, redirects by role, and handles errors.
frontend/src/pages/worker/WorkerDashboar: Shows worker tasks, weather, attendance, and allows marking tasks complete and uploading photo proofs. Uses local session store for task and attendance management.
frontend/src/state/fieldManagerSessionSt: Manages field manager session data in localStorage including input logs, task completions, photos, and worker assignments. Provides functions to add, update, and retrieve this data.
frontend/src/state/workerSessionStore.ts: Handles worker session data such as task completions, photo proofs, and attendance using localStorage. Exposes utilities to update and query stored worker state.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, with support for hash-based routing. Enables persisted parameter retrieval across navigation.
frontend/src/weather/forecast.ts: Generates a 7-day weather forecast for a village using simulated weather data. Returns daily entries with date, day label, and weather details.
frontend/src/weather/simulatedWeather.ts: Generates deterministic weather data per village using seeded randomness and computes a risk status with alerts.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project state, issues, required images, and feature definitions for fixing GreenX title visibility and adding agri‑tech visuals and role logos.
